article_title: Longmont police notes: Suspect at large in Christmas Eve domestic assault
article_text:
Longmont police on Thursday responded to a domestic violence incident in the 400 block of Emery Street. Officers found an adult female victim who had been beaten by her boyfriend, causing injury. The suspect is at large, but a warrant for his arrest has been obtained.

A Longmont resident in the 1700 block of Cambridge Drive reported her vehicle's tires slashed while parking at her residence. The case status is closed due to lack of suspect information.

Longmont police on Thursday took a report about an indecent exposure at the King Soopers at 1611 Pace St. The case is closed with no workable leads.
